long_description: When a gale blows in as you're pushing the final ascent, be glad you're wearing the Marmot Spire rain jacket. Waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex(R) fabric keeps you dry to the top. Three-layer construction sandwiches a Gore-Tex membrane between the outer material and backing material, adding durability without weight or bulk. Fully adjustable gale-force hood has laminated wire brim and is helmet compatible. Marmot Spire rain jacket features a zip-off powder skirt. Pit zips vent excess heat. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Integrated laser-drilled pocket backing for enhanced breathability. Pack-friendly pockets with water-resistant zippers; internal mesh storage pocket. DriClime(R) lined chin guard. Elastic drawcord hem.
